website_summaries.verdict: Cozy Dozys are cuddly little bear cubs that loves nothing more than being tucked into bed. Their expressive faces and cute noises will keep naptime fun.
cons: Due to her electronic parts, Cozy is not machine washable

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and soft
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my 7 year old daughter’s birthday. I believe it was her favorite. She has carried it everywhere for days and continues to use the packaging as a carrier. It’s so soft and adorable. The only downside is I wish it would have an automatic off feature because she occasionally walks off and leaves it on while the snoring noises continue. It can be a bit annoying after awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre

customer_reviews.title: Check battery setting...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 4 year old. I noticed it wasn't working correctly then realized it was on "try me mode". After putting on to its correct setting it works great. My daughter loves this bear. It giggles and snores and changes its facial expressions. It was slightly smaller then expected but a really cute toy. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: NiNi

customer_reviews.title: She’s purrrrrrrfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought her for my daughter who is 6.5 years old, we just got her and I gave the kitten to her early. She loves her so much, the kitten opens and closes her eyes, purrs and makes so many noises. I read on the reviews that she is small and I was hesitant to buy her just based on that but she is just the right size for a child!, she’s light and snuggly. I took a photo of the kitten next to my adult hand so you can see! We are very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 4 year old for Christmas. My 9 year old now wants one. They play with it all the time! I wish the box it came in was plastic so they could use it. They use the cardboard and carry her around, but we all know cardboard wont last long, especially with a toddler!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Cute but the worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and soft but it says it makes all these sounds and I don't think it does everything it says it does
customer_reviews.author: Maritza Rosas

customer_reviews.title: Best gift ever!
customer_reviews.text: The Easter bunny got this for my daughter and she loves it! It is the same quality that you would get in stores! Same softness and she loved it! She would notice a difference if there were any because this is not her first Little Live Pet. So glad this was as great as it was!
customer_reviews.author: Agnes Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a 5 year old
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my daughter as a Birthday gift after she asked for one. She loves it. It is adorable and we were careful not to destroy the packaging so she caries it around like a baby in a seat. It makes noise, but I dont find it bothersome.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel H

customer_reviews.title: Garbage, don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: Garbage. Stopped working after one night. Changed batteries, nothing still. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Elora Ackerman

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old saw this on YouTube and was begging for one. Santa brought her one for Christmas and she’s obsessed! Just an FYI for parents: it does make some pretty obnoxious sounds. Don’t say I didn’t warn ya 😁
customer_reviews.author: GirlMommy5

customer_reviews.title: Great Teddy! Interactive as well!
customer_reviews.text: This teddy is so cute. Packaging was perfect like a little cradle. The teddy makes cute little noises and takes a pacifier, also loves to be swaddled. It's super soft, interactive, and soo adorable!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Flareau

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and very loving toy
customer_reviews.text: It is much smaller than I was expecting but It what a great toy. My 8 y/o is still very occupied with Pinki. The box is like a paper basket and works as a bed. Sounds are not annoying at all and the best Tip- we put on her a diaper and clothes from baby alive- fits perfectly. Kinda thinking to get a brown one too.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Gift!
customer_reviews.text: This bear is absolutely adorable! It blinks it’s eyes and makes cute sounds. My 6 year old niece is in love with it! Don’t worry, you can turn the sound and animation off!
customer_reviews.author: Alison Sipos

customer_reviews.title: love this toy!!!
customer_reviews.text: you have to read the directions! it doesn't work right from the box b/c it is in demo mode. Great for the price, does so many cute things, I ordered another one for the other grandchild
customer_reviews.author: JILL T.

customer_reviews.title: Soft , pretty , well worth the cost !!
customer_reviews.text: Soft .. pretty .. really engaging toy .. Great value for nice interactive plush toy .. Bought for 6 yo grand daughter for Christmas .. She loves 😄💕 it ..!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammie P.

customer_reviews.title: Cute little bear
customer_reviews.text: It's so adorable! My little girl is always fake sleeping and snoring so she's going to get a kick out of this one. The bear makes sleeping sounds and takes a pacifier.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Good Gift!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old niece loves this! However, it's hard to tell if it's a cat or a bear. And it makes "sexual" noises. Oh well, my niece loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Too adorable
customer_reviews.text: Out of the more then 40 gifts my 3 yo granddaughter got she said this was her favorite. I purchased a plastic light carrier cause this is cardboaed.
customer_reviews.author: laura211

customer_reviews.title: SO DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: The doll had been turned on & the battery was run down. When I tried to put new batteries in the screw was stripped so it couldn’t be opened! One VERY VERY disappointed little girl.
customer_reviews.author: Kj

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: The bear is very small and only makes a few noises.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: 👍👍👍
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves this. Goes everywhere with it. Bought one 6 months ago. Gets dirty over time so bought another. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun to play with...
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old grand daughter had to have this!!! She carries "Pinky" everywhere... Just interactive enough to keep her interested. This toy can take quite a bit of time to "go to sleep"...
customer_reviews.author: Stephie

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: This bear is really cute, does exactly what it is suppose to. It is a great toy for kids
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it!! Very cute and entertaining if your child is into nurturing stage.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Glover

customer_reviews.title: Kept my kids occupied
customer_reviews.text: Kept my kids entertained for hours. Small, doesn't do much for the money, but my 7 yr old and 4 yr old LOVES theirs.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: OMG, So adorable!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 yr old grand daughter absolutely went bonkers for this toy! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Brinda

customer_reviews.title: Kid loves it. But over priced
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. Only thing is, it is very over priced. Don’t have much noticeable reactions. But my kid really loves it, so I am happy for that.
customer_reviews.author: Albin

customer_reviews.title: Every 2 year olds dream baby!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it! She received it for Christmas as a gift from her Grandfather and she plays with it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: Very cute. Daughters love it
customer_reviews.text: My 5 yr old daughter loves this. When she’s in school my 15 month old plays with it. She hugs it and carries it all around the house. I will have to end up getting her one too. Very cute gift.
customer_reviews.author: Corinna

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Did not know what to expect, since I'd never seen before. But it was a great gift to a granddaughter; she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: Precious
customer_reviews.text: This was on my granddaughter's wish list and she loved it! Very huggable!
customer_reviews.author: James O. Piebes

customer_reviews.title: CHECK THE EYES!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 4 of these in August to be given for grandchildrens’ birthdays in September, October, December and April. Of 3 that have been given, one has a defective eye. Too late to return because bday was this month. Didn’t know I needed to check for defects before they were given.
customer_reviews.author: Deebo

customer_reviews.title: Super kute
customer_reviews.text: So adorable and kute my daughter takes this to school and won’t let go of it.
customer_reviews.author: Tan ma

customer_reviews.title: can't put down!
customer_reviews.text: My almost 4 year old twin granddaughters squealed when these arrived. They have not put them down!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cozy Dozy Pink Bear
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved the bear and it came when they said it would.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn Schermerhorn

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought but cute I found it here for cheaper then target by at least $20.00, my daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We brought this for our Niece for her birthday. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Ernestine

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Great gift for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: Cutest little bear ever! Very soft! Very lifelike face when she moves and open and closes her eye. So cuddly
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Moore

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute toy. My daughter loves it. So soft.
customer_reviews.author: Tera

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely adorable and not too big.
customer_reviews.text: My child has all three colors of the cozy dozies. They are soft and small and super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this! It’s a great value. It’s just as adorable when it’s on the off mode and no sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves her baby. Great idea for little girls
customer_reviews.author: Sonja

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work well. Kinda hard bear. Not a hit with the granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: bears11

customer_reviews.title: Great product, fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: My Granddaughter just Loved this gift. Received fast as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Villarrial

customer_reviews.title: Cute but small and boring
customer_reviews.text: It’s much smaller than expected. And really doesn’t do much or interact like it’s supposed to. Only growls and giggles. That’s about it. Other than that it’s really soft and a cute concept.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Hanscome

customer_reviews.title: Toy received was not new
customer_reviews.text: Clearly a used toy. Box is taped together poorly and the toy itself looks like it has been played with. Highly disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Hall

customer_reviews.title: Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter for Christmas she seen it on tv and wanted it so I can’t wait to see her open it on Christmas
customer_reviews.author: Desirea Zachary

customer_reviews.title: Interactive
customer_reviews.text: A new love for my girl during bedtime. Interactive and snuggly;)
customer_reviews.author: Derrick

customer_reviews.title: 5 year old loves this.
customer_reviews.text: GOt this for my daughter's 5th birthday and she loves it
customer_reviews.author: Melissa <31985

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Gift well received and used by the child who received it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loves this thing! And super cute! Really small which is good for her size!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this toy for my granddaughter and she loves it so much. It is so soft and the noises it makes are so adorable.
customer_reviews.author: wonderwoman

customer_reviews.title: Just what she asked for!
customer_reviews.text: This was such a joy to give!! My granddaughter squealed with joy when she opened her Cozy Dozy!! I was thrilled that she liked it so much.
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: Fun Fun Fun.
customer_reviews.text: Great toy, and the sounds are great. Given several away and they are always a hit.
customer_reviews.author: Cleo

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES her cozy dozy! She loves to cuddle the bear and take care of it. She sleeps with her every night. We gave one as a gift as well, and it was a huge hit!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Whitcomb

customer_reviews.title: Great Present but stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I gave this bear as a present for my niece and she was so excited! The bear has suddenly stopped opening her eyes. She will make noise but it is like her eyes are not meant to open.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Shubert

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not for real small children
customer_reviews.text: Cute kinda hard for a small child due to battery pack inside.
customer_reviews.author: jodie B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 5 year old
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old daughter LOVES this little bear. She sleeps with it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Smilemelissa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids
customer_reviews.text: easy to cuddle and my 3 year old and 8 year old love it
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Cute gift
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for my 7 year old for Christmas. She has been asking for it for months now. It's super soft and is absolutely adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Did not last one month. Very cute, but even new batteries did not make it work. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Joyciemay

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Very good product and I love that it’s pink! We’ve never saw a pink one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cozy dozy pink
customer_reviews.text: It is really adorable sounds that it makes. My granddaughter loved it They are very soft and cuddly
customer_reviews.author: donna roberts

customer_reviews.title: Very cuddly
customer_reviews.text: This was given as a bday gift for my daughter, she loves it already!

customer_reviews.title: Damaged packaging
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the box to the toy was bent and ripped in multiple places, not a nice look for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bass

customer_reviews.title: So special
customer_reviews.text: Love this tiny pink baby bear she matches my tiny tan baby bear

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Very cute toy! Just seams to giggle and snore on repeat however.
customer_reviews.author: Kharstyn

customer_reviews.title: Christmas hit!
customer_reviews.text: She loved it, and so did her sister and cousin. Off to order two more!
customer_reviews.author: BeckyH

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended it.
customer_reviews.text: It is very cute. The perfect present for a 2 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Francis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: This toy is absolutely awesome! My daughter fell in love with it at Target and we knew we’d have to get it for her! She not only got the pink one but also the purple one. They sleep with her in bed and she wouldn’t have it any other way! Would totally buy again! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Cirar

product_meta.title: Little Live Pets Cozy Dozy Pinki The Bear - Over 25 Sounds and Reactions | Bedtime Buddies, Blanket and Pacifier Included | Stuffed Animal, Best Nap Time, Interactive Teddy Bear
product_meta.description: Style:PinkiNew from little live are Cozy Dozys, who are super soft and interactive cuddly teddy bears that are so playful and the perfect bedtime buddies. Meet Pinki, the Cozy Dozy bear who is always daydreaming. She spends her day thinking up the most amazing stories. In the evening she is ready to snuggle up in her blanket so she can fall asleep and dream about the adventures she has created in her head! Zzz
feature_bullets: Wrap Me in my blanket and soothe Me to sleep
Pinki, the Cozy Dozy is so soft and cuddly, she makes the best bedtime buddy
Use my pacifier to send me to sleep
Tickle me and I'll close my eyes and start to giggle
Pet my head! I react and respond to your touch
I'm so alive! I have over 25 sounds and reactions

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars714 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
